i1.blurb: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Hitting an enemy with an ability grants '''Vi''' a {{sti|shield|{{as|15% '''maximum''' health}} shield}} for up to 3 seconds.
''Blast Shield's'' cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}}.
i1.name: Blast Shield
notes: * Triggering {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will not activate ''Blast Shield''.
i1.static: {{pp|9|16 to 12|formula=16.5-0.5 per level up to 9, where it caps}}

q1.blurb: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Vault Breaker's'' {{sti|range}}, speed, and damage over {{fd|1.25}} seconds. While charging, '''Vi''' is {{tip|pacify|pacified}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15%.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies she passes through, increased by {{pp|type=channel time|11|key=%|0 to 100|0 to 1.25|round1=3|formula=10% per 0.125 seconds. ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}.
'''Vi''' stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} while other units are instead {{tip|airborne|pulled}} towards her.
''Vault Breaker'' will go on a 3 second cooldown and refund {{sti|mana|{{as|50% of its mana cost}}}} if '''Vi''' is interrupted during the channeling.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 155}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|55*2 to 155*2}} {{as|(+ 140% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.name: Vault Breaker
notes: * Despite being {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, ''Vi'' can still {{si|Flash}} (and cast all other [[summoner spells]] except {{si|Teleport}}) during ''Vault Breaker's'' channel.
* ''Vi'' can reduce ''Vault Breaker's'' {{tip|slow}} with [[slow resist]] but cannot remove/reduce it with {{si|Cleanse}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage (will not prevent {{ais|Denting Blows|Vi}} application).
q1.speed: {{pp|type=channel time|11|1250 to 1400|round1=3|0 to 1.25|formula=1250+(15 per 0.125 seconds). ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}
q1.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|11|250 to 725|round1=3|0 to 1.25|formula=250+(47.5 per 0.125 seconds). ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}

w1.blurb: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi's''' [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}} apply ''Denting Blows'' to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 ''Denting Blows'', '''Vi''' consumes them to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped at 300 against non-champions.
For the next 4 seconds, '''Vi''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and the target has {{as|20% reduced armor}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 10}}% {{as|(+{{ft|1% per 35|{{fd|2.86}}% per 100}}'''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
w1.name: Denting Blows
notes: * ''Denting Blows'' stacks will not reset when ''Vi'' switches targets.
* ''Denting Blows'' '''bonus''' attack speed will not stack with itself when ''Vi'' gains ''Denting Blows'' bonuses from the same target repeatedly or from multiple enemies in quick succession.

* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can both {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal as well as apply {{sti|life steal}} (the bonus damage cannot do either) but does not affect structures.
* ''Denting Blows'' can be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} but cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or negated if ''Vi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

e1.blurb: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi''' periodically stores up to 2 ''Excessive Force'' charges.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi's''' next basic attack gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a cone in front of her. The damage can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
e1.name: Excessive Force
notes: * ''Excessive Force'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Vi's'' previous orders.
* {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will only apply a stack on ''Excessive Force's'' primary target (does not interact with the cone's damage).

* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s, can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the cone damage will also crit), apply {{sti|life steal}}, and affect structures if they are the primary target (the cone's damage does not affect them).

* ''Excessive Force'' can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or mitigated (the cone's damage is still applied) if ''Vi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability (or the cone's damage when hitting a secondary target).

r1.blurb: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|dash|rushes}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target enemy champion, dealing {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
Enemies along the way are {{tip|airborne|knocked aside}} by 350 units for {{fd|0.75}} seconds and dealt the same damage.
r1.name: Assault and Battery
